California’s Proposed Billionaire Tax Sparks Silicon Valley Backlash
California’s Proposed Billionaire Tax Sparks Silicon Valley Backlash
Edited By
WION Video Desk
Published:
Jan 15, 2026, 10:51 IST
| Updated:
Jan 15, 2026, 10:51 IST
A proposed billionaire tax in California is sending shockwaves through Silicon Valley and reigniting fears of a wealth exodus from the United States’ largest state economy. The plan would impose a one time levy on the accumulated assets of billionaires, becoming a flashpoint for business leaders already concerned about high taxes, strict regulation and rising living costs.
